main: ^A small orange and white cat runs into the road, followed closely by a young girl. The car has to swerve to a stop to avoid hitting her.
^Give her something to keep her off the road.

c-0: ^The girl scoops up the cat and runs off crying, noticed by a few passersby.
c-1: ^The cat and girl wander off the road and you continue onwards.
c-2: ^You toss her a dollar and tell her to get a candy from the market. She takes it, beaming, and hurries off, the cat following close behind her.
